name: "PJ Special" Grilled Cheese
author: PJBeach
summary: Not for the faint of heart, this sandwich has flavor to spare. My dad won't even eat regular grilled cheese any more.
ingredients: 4 teaspoons horseradish mustard (such as Silver Spring® Beer'n Brat®)
2 teaspoons softened butter, or to taste
directions: Mix Cheddar cheese, horseradish mustard, garlic, salt, pepper, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl
Spread 1 teaspoon butter on one side of a slice of bread
Flip; spread Cheddar cheese mixture evenly over unbuttered side
Top with the other slice of bread
Preheat a griddle over medium-high heat
Place sandwich on the griddle and press down with a spatula to flatten slightly
Flip and continue cooking until second side is browned, 2 to 3 minutes more
